title: Beginning Blends: BL, CL, FL
description: Learn consonant blends that start words like blue, clap, and flag!
subject: phonics
objectives: Read words with bl-, cl-, fl- blends

activities.instructions: Blends are two letters that make sounds together! Let's learn some.
activities.content:
Consonant blends are special!
Two letters work together:
BL like in BLUE
CL like in CLAP
FL like in FLAG

activities.instructions: The BL blend sounds like 'bl'. Say it with me!
activities.spokenInstructions: The B L blend. Blue, black, block.

activities.instructions: The CL blend sounds like 'cl'. Let's practice!
activities.spokenInstructions: The C L blend. Clap, clock, cloud.

activities.instructions: The FL blend sounds like 'fl'. Your turn!
activities.spokenInstructions: The F L blend. Flag, flat, flower.

activities.hint: You do this with your hands

activities.instructions: Which word starts with the BL blend?
activities.question: Which word starts with the BL blend?
activities.explanation: BLUE starts with the BL blend!

activities.instructions: Which word starts with the FL blend?
activities.question: Which word starts with the FL blend?
activities.explanation: FLOWER starts with the FL blend!
